entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
